title: Foster's Group Fonts
content:
Any help with font ID on these would be greatly appreciated oh great Font Gurus. Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Fosters.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=Fosters.jpg) | 94.38 KB |
author: x8x8x

comments.content:
“Consumer led…”, the reversed type, and “Simon” are all in various weights of TheSans.

[http://www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&font\_categories\_search=font\_name\_search&searchstr=thesans&image.x=0&image.y=0](http://web.archive.org/web/20060110033802/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&font_categories_search=font_name_search&searchstr=thesans&image.x=0&image.y=0)

“FOSTER’S GROUP” (top left) is Cronos, probably the Regular weight.

[http://store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P\_1733.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20060110033802/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1733.html)
Thanks. Hmmmm, pricey and ugly… what a combo!
